name: Hollywood Hijinx
description: Hollywood Hijinx is an interactive fiction computer game written by Dave Anderson and Liz Cyr-Jones and published by Infocom in 1986. The game was released for the Apple II, Atari 8-bit family, Amstrad CPC, Amstrad PCW, Commodore 64, Amiga, Atari ST, TI-99/4A and MS-DOS. It was Infocom's twenty-third game.
